name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Twitch Addon for BTTV: Remove timeout slider

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes the moderation-context menu that would usually appear after right-clicking a user with BTTV installed

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The BTTV extension adds a moderation tool when you right-click a user. It allows for easier moderation, however may clash with other extensions. This extension hides that overlay.
